column1: It's nothing serious... I'm just here for my annual check-up.
column2: 沒什麼……我只是來做年度體檢的！

column1: Well... my nose has been a little runny, Doctor. But otherwise I'm doing fine!
column2: 嗯……醫生，只是有點流鼻涕。除此以外都很好！

column1: It's too cold to get out of bed.
Hi, honey! I'm mostly just here to visit Emily.
column2: 嗨，寶貝！我來這裡是為了探望艾米麗。

column1: The weather's too horrible to get out of bed.
Brrr.... I'm not dressed for this...
column2: 唔唔唔……我並非為此才穿衣打扮……

column1: It's too cold to get out of bed.
